# UICellAccessory.LayoutDimension.standard

**Case**

The accessory layout uses the system standard layout dimension for accessories.

## Declaration

```swift
case standard
```

## Constants

- **UICellAccessory.LayoutDimension.actual**: The accessory layout uses its actual dimension.
- **UICellAccessory.LayoutDimension.custom(_:)**: The accessory layout uses the specified custom value.

items.description: The accessory layout uses its actual dimension.
